title: Hallmark choosing to cancel The Way Home after season 4 is the right call – asking Netflix for season 5 is a waste of time
description: The Way Home season 4 drops in 2026, and it will be the final ever season. Instead of asking Netflix to make more, we should enjoy what we have.
content: There's good news and bad news for Hallmark fans – the good news being that The Way Home season 4 will be coming in 2026. The bad news? Hallmark has confirmed that it will be the last ever season of … [+3267 chars]
